subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: With 10 days before opening day, it is unclear whether either Ike Davis or Lucas Duda, who are competing for the Mets’ starting first baseman’s job, will be ready to start the season.
snippet: With 10 days before opening day, it is unclear whether either Ike Davis or Lucas Duda, who are competing for the Mets’ starting first baseman’s job, will be ready to start the season.
